discounts.offerText: Extra Flat ₹250 OFF using ICICI Bank Net Banking Valid on final payable amount of ₹3500 or more Offer only applicable on ICICI Bank Net Banking Offer valid once per user during the offer period Restaurants applicable under this program can be found on the app & are subject to change from time to time Offer is applicable on all days Other T&Cs may apply
